alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 1:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Custer and southwestern Pennington Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 126 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Custer State Park, or 5 miles northeast of Custer, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hill City and Palmer Gulch Resort around 130 PM MDT. Keystone, Hayward, Mount Rushmore National Memorial and Horse Thief Lake around 135 PM MDT. Rockerville and Sheridan Lake around 140 PM MDT. Bear Country around 145 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include southwestern Rapid City, Johnson Siding, Hisega, Reptile Gardens, Hart Ranch and Black Gap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills
